description: Try sprinkling this easy chilli and fennel seasoning on grilled meat and vegetables for a flavour explosion. It'll be perfect to use at your next barbecue.
keywords: Sauce & condiment,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Quick & easy,Dec 2021,Halal,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chilli & Fennel Salt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place all the ingredients in a small food processor and process until combined and salt is crushed slightly. Transfer to a sterilised jar.
